1164840.name: PBT - Brain Center
1164840.description:
Education For Everyone

Free additional content to Power Brain Trainer. Here you will find interesting scientific topics in the mathematics section. Brain Center is a parallel branch of PBT, which is being developed as an innovative educational platform. Interesting mathematical topics are waiting for you, which we talk about as interesting and understandable as possible. Forget about boring articles where it's very difficult to understand. Together with Brain Center you can really discover a lot of useful and interesting things. In addition to the text material, you will find unusual tools to support what is written.

The following topics are waiting for you today:

  • • chaos theory
  • irrationality
  • googolplex
  • combinatorics
  • infinity

Join now! Let's start brain training, learning and improving!
1164840.supported_languages: 英语, 波兰语, 俄语, 乌克兰语
